alert.note: Alert for Shannon (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 2:21PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Shannon and northern Oregon Counties through 245 PM CDT... At 220 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Alton, or 18 miles northeast of Thayer, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Winona, Alton, Thomasville and Greer. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for south central Missouri.
